courses.title: Know the Operating Systems
courses.descr: Kali Linux is a one-of-a-kind operating system that is used openly by both the bad and good guys. This operating system is widely used by both black hat hackers and security administrators. One prevents and detects security breachers, while the other identifies and potentially exploits security breachers

courses.title: Hacking the MAC
courses.descr: MAC Address stands for Media Access Control Address. It ensures that the physical address of the computer is unique.MAC spoofing is a technique for changing a factory-assigned MAC address of a network interface on a networked device. It's just like taking over someone else's identity and performing actions by impersonating them

courses.title: Gathering Information
courses.descr: Generally there are five steps in Hacking that one needs to follow. These are Footprinting or Information Gathering, Scanning,Gaining Access, Maintaining Access, Clearning Tracks.

courses.title: Surfing Anonymously
courses.descr: As a hacker, you need to cover your tracks and surf anonymously. Surfing online leaks a lot of personal data that you might wish to keep private. Thus, VPN will help you do that. Using a VPN, you can surf anonymously and prevent your personal data form getting leaked on the browser.

courses.title: Hiding Messages
courses.descr: The concept of hiding messages plays an important role in hacking. You can do that with the help of something called Steganography.

courses.title: Social Media Hacking
courses.descr: You go fishing, you carry a net/trap with you and you wait for fish to get trapped in your net, or you lure it with some food and catch it. Similarly, phishing is a term used to identify techniques that hackers or cybercriminals use to 'fish' a person and launder the information.

courses.title: Credit and Debit Card Frauds
courses.descr: There are many situations when many times we get fake calls. The caller pretends to be a person from some legitimate company or a bank and offers some deal and in return asks for sensitive information such as bank account or more.

courses.title: Keyboard spying
courses.descr: Keyboard spying, also called Keylogging is one of the most used and dangerous attacks taht a hacker can perform.A Keylogger is a software that is able to record all your actions or keystroke performed on a computer.

courses.title: Wifi Hacking -WPA-WPA2 Cracking
courses.descr: Why Kali Linux is used for hacking? Kali Linux is a one-of-a-kind operating system that is used openly by both the bad and good guys. This operating system is widely used by both black hat hackers and security administrators. One prevents and detects security breachers, while the other identifies and potentially exploits security breachers

courses.title: Network Spying
courses.descr: It does not matter whether it's a Wi-Fi network or a wired network, once you have gained access to it, you can perform various attacks on it

courses.title: Database Hacking
courses.descr: Hackers can extract your login credentials, your personal information, and such other sensitive data tht is stored in the database.This can be done using an attack called SQL Injection.

courses.title: Android Hacking
courses.descr: Android is one of the most used mobile operating systems and one of the most vulnerable ones.

courses.title: Bringing down a website
courses.descr: Hackers can attack and flood a website with fake requests resulting in bringing down the webiste and denying the service to its legitmate users. This is called a Denial of Service attack.

courses.title: Cross-Site Scripting
courses.descr: Typically, the attack injects malicious JavaScript code into your website. When people go to your website, the browser dowloads the script and executes it. As a result, the attacker can gain user informatin through session cookies or even date provided by user themselves

courses.title: Make your data safe
courses.descr: Cryptography is an essential way of preventing data hacks from happening. It secures information and communications, using set of rules that allows only those intended-and no one else.

courses.title: Hacking Passwords
courses.descr: In this session, we will see how to secure a password, and how can we crack a Windows machine's password.

courses.title: WordPress Scanning
courses.descr: Wordpress is a Content Management System that uses the most widely used Coding Stack.Thus, it is necessary to scan the WordPress for possible bugs and vulnerabilities.

courses.title: Vulnerability Scanning and Reporting
courses.descr: Nexpose identifies the active services, open ports, and running applications on each machine, and it attempts to find vulnerabilities that may exist.

courses.title: Social Engineering
courses.descr: Social engineering is the tactic of manipulating, influencing, or deceiving a victim in order to gain control over a computer system, or to steal personal and financial information.

courses.title: Phishing and Security
courses.descr: Phishing is a form of social engineering where attackers deceive people into revealing sensitive information or installing malware such as ransomware.
